title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the project requirements, including the desired features, user stories, technical specifications, and constraints for the AI code reviewer. Consider aspects such as problem statement parsing, code analysis (syntax, logic, efficiency, edge cases, error handling, best practices), feedback generation (personalized suggestions, optimization techniques, code explanations), performance requirements, scalability (handling large code submissions, concurrent users), security (input validation, secure code analysis, user authentication), integration with LeetCode platform or other coding platforms, and user interface design (code submission, feedback display, user profiles).

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the components, data flow, and integration points for the AI code reviewer.

title: Develop AI Code Analysis Engine
description: Implement the core AI engine for analyzing and providing feedback on code solutions submitted to LeetCode-style problems.

title: Build User Interface
description: Develop the user interface for submitting code solutions, displaying feedback, and interacting with the AI code reviewer.

title: Implement Data Storage and Management
description: Set up the database and data management system for storing and retrieving code solutions, feedback, and user data.

title: Establish DevOps and Deployment Processes
description: Set up the continuous integration, deployment, and monitoring processes for the AI code reviewer application.

title: Conduct Security Audits and Compliance Checks
description: Perform security audits and ensure compliance with relevant regulations and industry standards for handling user data and code submissions.

title: Create Test Suite and Quality Assurance Plan
description: Develop a comprehensive test suite and quality assurance plan to ensure the AI code reviewer functions as expected and provides accurate feedback.

title: Write Documentation and User Guides
description: Create documentation and user guides to help users understand and effectively use the AI code reviewer.
